because 3 audio streams on a dvd 5 means some serious compression rate which renders the movie viewable only on a rather poor quality screen. 
and it's not "special for me", even tho i would appreciate it very much, but for every1 who loves quality video. it makes little sense nowadays to burn a dvd5 of low quality when u can burn a dvd9 of much better one, since the price of dvd9 is not where it was a couple of years ago. 

in the end, i was only asking u, NLUPPER002, if it's possible to cater to more quality oriented tastes. and i'm sure that i will not be the only one who would appreciate it. 

thanx.
